product_name: Haribo Happy Cola Gummi Candy - 5 oz.
long_description: Enjoy the yummy Haribo Happy Cola Gummi candy anytime, anywhere. Cola-flavored gummi candies are shaped like bottles. Delicious, nonfat way to satisfy your sweet tooth. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Enjoy the yummy Haribo Happy Cola Gummi candy anytime, anywhere.
